评论概述: Good Quality Top But Too Snug
评论详情: Hello. This crop is a good quality but it is too snug. I ordered my size; It was too tight. The colour is snow white. The material is thick. The top itself looks good but is tight on me. I considered ordering the next larger size but it would probably be loose on me.
Really cut and material doesn’t feel thin or cheap. I’m plus size but not busty and I think it’d be a tight squeeze if I were so you’d have to go up a size or 2 if you have bigger boobs
I like that this was a thicker material that hid my stomach imperfection. I wore a lot over the summer. Highly recommend. washed up well.

I ordered a size medium. I love this basic white tank top. It is very good quality and stretchy. In the pictures, I was wearing a strapless bra underneath, if you wear nothing underneath, it is not thick enough to fully cover and conceal the chest area. I prefer to wear pasties or a bra with this tank top. I am about 135-140 lbs in this picture, 5'4 in height. I would recommend this product to a friend. It is not see through at all.

I absolutely LOVE these tank tops!! I purchased two different ones for a beach wedding because I wasn't sure which color I'd prefer with the outfit I was wearing. Despite choosing the white top, I still decided to keep the other color because I liked it so much and know I'll use the other one (brown) to pair with something eventually. I also recently ordered the black one and plan to order more in other colors. The zipper reveals just enough while also keeping the girls tucked in and hugs nicely to your body. It feels like being hugged by a cloud. You will not regret this purchase!

Ordered a three of these tank tops on black, white, and brown, all in a size medium. The black and the white tanks are the same size when placed over eachother, but the brown tank is clearly a size small but improperly labeled as a medium.  I do like the tank tops very much and they are very comfortable. The fabric is double lined but still somewhat thin. I just wish I could have kept all 3 tanks and had them be the correct size that I ordered.
Great tops I have 5 colors now. Great fabric

I bought one to see how it is and WOW AMAZING! Bought 2 more and plan to eventually buy ALL colors lol truly is a perfect fit!!! I applaud the maker and thank them! I weigh 200 lbs mostly boobs lol im a size 42 DDD and I dont need a bra with this! It holds, lifts perfectly!

评论概述: nice cut, needs padding or nipple covers
评论详情: Love the silkiness of the fabric and the cut of the tank. But I can't wear it without some padding. I use some removable bra pads and just place them between my skin and this tank top. It's fitted enough that the pads don't slip down. I even go to yoga wearing it like that. Cakes (the grippy pads) would be even better. And maybe some of the darker colors of tanks don't need it, but the white tank is not at all discreet without pads.

Comfy, fits true to size, but came with seemingly permanent wrinkles that don't come out in the wash even after three washes. Might try to steam it to see if that helps. Besides the permanent wrinkles, love it. That's the only reason for 4/5 stars.

These are great shirts and super versatile. I can wear them to yoga class or out to dinner. The fabric is super thick and stretchy so I don’t have to wear a bra, but am still supported. 100% recommend!

Double-lined and comfortable! This doesn’t shrink in the dryer and holds up being bleached. The white one does hold onto armpit staining but will come out with hydrogen peroxide dish soap and baking soda.
Can pair with literally any outfit. True to size and GREAT quality for the price. I just bought it in white, too!

I am 5'9", 145lbs, A-cup, I ordered a large to test how it fits and it's PERFECT. (I ordered a medium first and that one fit really well too, either size is great, the Medium is just a little more snug than I prefer). Not too tight not too loose. Sits right above the belt line on high-waisted jeans. So so so so flattering. The fabric is super smooth and elastic so it hugs just right. No need for a bra because the fabric is doubled up. Great quality fabric. I'll be buying more of these. PERFECT.
Looks like the photo. i have a lot of colors. Sometimes these are too short easy return is good. Overall i am very happy with these tops

I really like this tank top — the double lining is really nice and feels well-made. i went true to size and it’s fitted enough to be supportive/smoothing without being too tight/squeezing. i usually wear a bra under mine but you could probably get away wearing this without one if you don’t need a lot of support. i like that i can wear this with sporty/athletic outfits, but also with jeans or nicer pants if i want to dress it up a bit. overall very nice — ill probably buy in other colors eventually.
The coral is BRIGHT! It was very flattering, sizing was accurate. Appropriate price for the top.

I bought this for a dance I am in. I was looking for comfort and flexible material that is breathable and easy to move in. I needed it to match the shorts for my performance. The color was exactly what the picture shows. The size fit to the described measurements. I would not hesitate to buy from this company again.
Nice material! I wish it had sewn in cups!

评论详情: I have this top in every color; it is amazing quality; HOWEVER, I have had a few that were CLEARLY worn returns which is an Amazon QA issue and I want to make clear it isn’t the product itself. IMPORTANT - if this top doesn’t come in a vacuum sealed package, it is a return. I have nothing against accepting a return that has not been used or damaged but a couple have been so if you receive this in a non vacuum sealed package, check for use and/or damage.
